channel.title: Homepage of Muhammad Afifurrahman on Muhammad Afifurrahman
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage of Muhammad Afifurrahman on Muhammad Afifurrahman

item.title: Research & Education
item.description: Research Broadly speaking, I am interested in discrete mathematics, especially number theory, combinatorics, and finite fields. For my PhD, I am currently working on various problem related to integer equations of restricted height. During my bachelor and master studies, I did a total of two final projects over finite fields. However, I am open for learning other topics. Publications Muhammad Afifurrahman. A uniform formula on the number of integer matrices with given determinant and height, submitted.

item.title: Activities
item.description: Other Mathematical Activities University of New South Wales Class Tutor for MATH1231 Mathematics 2A (2024-present) Class Tutor for MATH1081 Discrete Mathematics (2024-present) Drop-in Centre Tutor (2023-present) Exams Invigilator (2022-present) Exams & Assignments Marker (2022-present) Institut Teknologi Bandung Drop-in Centre Tutor (2019-2022) Exams Invigilator (2018-2022) Exams & Assignments Marker (2018-2022) Mathematical Olympiad Assistant Tutor, Indonesia International Mathematical Olympiad Training Camp (2017-present) Freelance mathematical olympiad tutor (2017-present) Reading Groups With Laurence Petrus Wijaya, I coordinate reading groups on mathematical papers in Bahasa Indonesia from 2023.

item.title: Other Works
item.description: Mettamatika Project Mettamatika Project comes from Spearhead Circle, a pop-culture collective based in Indonesia, with backbones from my friends in ITB. The main mission of Mettamatika is giving books that blend mathematical contents with pop cultures. Being a part of the scripwriter team in Mettamatika Project (under nickname Furra), I have made a series of mathematical zines on statistical bias in Mettamatika vol 0.5 (2023), a calculus book for Mettamatika vol.

item.title: Links & Musings
item.description: Yui Funami, YuruYuri. This was the frontpage picture for a long time, and when I changed the picture, my friend told me to let Yui stay here. Other links Here are my English and Indonesian blogs (which are infrequently updated). During the pandemic, I often crash into some online mathematical research seminars from Research Seminars webpage. In fact, I first knew my doctoral advisor from the Number Theory Web Seminar that she organizes.
